io.sarl.util

Interface ListenerNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SequenceListenerNotifier, SmartListenerCollection
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ListenerNotifier
    This interface represents an object that is able to provide a notification policy for calling Java event listeners.
    Since:
    0.10
    Version:
    io.sarl.util 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.util

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <L extends EventListener>
      void      		 notifyListeners(listeners : L[], action : Consumer<L>)
      Build a call policy for the given list of listeners and call them.

    • Method Detail

      • notifyListeners

        def notifyListeners(listeners : L[],
                    action : Consumer<L>) : void  with <L extends EventListener>
        Description copied from interface: ListenerNotifier
        Build a call policy for the given list of listeners and call them.
        Type Parameters:
        L - the type of event listener to support.
        Parameters:
        listeners - is the list of listeners to call.
        action - is the action to apply on each listener.
